summary: We accompany as witnesses Pasqual Maragall (Former President of Catalonia and former Mayor of Barcelona) and his surroundings during the first steps in the fight against Alzheimer's.
cast: Suvarna Alladi|Fidel Bellmunt|Monique Breteler|Jordi Camí|Jordi Clarimon|Diana Garrigosa|Frank González|Teresa Gómez Isla|Zaven Khachaturian|Virginia Lee|Airy Maragall|Cristina Maragall|Ernest Maragall|Pasqual Maragall|Quim Maragall|Eva Nebot|Queco Novell|Ronald Petersen|Gerard Schellenberg|Toni Soler|Carles Bosch|Sofía de Grecia|Iván de la Peña|Ricard Gomà|Jordi Hereu|Xavi Hernández|Trinidad Jiménez|Imma Mayol|Eduardo Mendoza|Lionel Messi|José Montilla|Gemma Nierga|Rosa Novell|Julia Otero|Gerard Piqué|Elena Salgado|Joan Manuel Serrat|Raúl Tamudo|Montserrat Tura|Víctor Valdés
title: Bicicleta, cullera, poma
